results.name: Central Delannoy numbers (mod 3); Characteristic function for Cantor set.
comment: More generally also sum(k=0,n,binomial(n,k)^x*binomial(n+k,k)^y) (mod 3) for any x>=1 in N and any odd y>=1.
a(n) = 0 if the ternary expansion of n contains one or more 1-digits, otherwise 1. - _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 23 2019
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..59048

formula: a(n) = 2 - A105220(n) = 1 - A316829(n). - _Antti Karttunen_ and _Jon Maiga_, Aug 24 2019
